object.name: blackberry.identity
object.comment: The Identity object contains information regarding the user's identity and accounts on a BlackBerry smartphone.
object.example:
<script type="text/javascript">
  var transportList = blackberry.identity.getTransportList();
  for (var i = 0; i < transportList.length; i++) {
    alert("Transport name is:" + transportList[i].name + "\ntransport type:" + transportList[i].type);
  }
  
  alert("PIN: " + blackberry.identity.PIN);
  alert("IMSI: " + blackberry.identity.IMSI);
  alert("IMEI: " + blackberry.identity.IMEI);
</script>

func.name: getServiceList
func.comment: Returns the list of Service objects that describe each of the services that the user has for their device.
func.details: Return a list of service objects describing all the services registered for the BlackBerry device. This list of services could include different accounts, such as their multiple BES/Unite accounts, Hotmail accounts, or Google accounts.

func.name: getTransportList
func.comment: Returns a list of possible communications transports that can be used.
func.details: Returns an array of transport objects that represent the available transports on the list.
